title: Bug 109718 - Text item displays large content in one line instead of expected format
description: When a large content is inserted into a text item, the tips should be displayed in a given format. However, currently, the tips are shown in one line.
OB: The tips for the text item are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips for the text item should be displayed in the expected format.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Insert a text item into the layout.
2. Enter the following text in the text item: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7'
